title: Green Salad with Gorgonzola and Walnuts
introduction: The flavors of walnuts and gorgonzola fit together perfectly. Here they are tossed with tender Boston lettuce leaves and a simple oil and vinegar dressing. This salad is perfect as a light meal or as a complement to a hearty bowl of soup.
ingredients: 1 to 2 tablespoons red or white wine vinegar
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
4 ounces gorgonzola, rind removed and crumbled
instructions: 1. Wash the lettuce in several changes of cold water. Dry very well. Tear the greens into bite-size pieces.
2. Whisk together the oil, vinegar, and salt and pepper to taste. Pour the dressing over the salad and toss until well coated. Taste for seasoning.
3. Add the cheese and walnuts. Toss again. Serve immediately.
